website_summaries.verdict: The Hypersprint 5 is a perfect combination of performance and style. Its lightweight composition enhances the speed of the athlete. This track and field shoe from Asics was explicitly developed to offer support in areas where it is precisely needed. The shoe also comes at an affordable price, making it a good purchase, given its overall performance.
pros: Many of the runners like the Asics Hypersprint 5 for its excellent grip on the track
According to a number of athletes, the shoe offers a great fit
Several of the wearers like how the shoe manages to enhance their speed
The shoe's breathable upper construction is noted by most users to be very comfortable
The Hypersprint 5's fit is perfect, remarked a couple of purchasers
cons: One reviewer says that the Asics Hypersprint 5 does not offer a natural feel to the foot
Several wearers mention that the shoe does not provide sufficient support

customer_reviews.title: Light and fast
customer_reviews.text: At age 65 I may be one of the oldest people to rate this product, but I'm trying to turn back the clock in the track club I belong to. I've worn them twice so far and my mile and 800 meter times are already better than my best from last year. Track season has ten more weeks, and I'm looking forward to doing even better. These shoes are real light and grip the track well.
customer_reviews.author: KenLarsen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for cutting your lawn.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 66 year old man that wears these shoes every time I cut my lawn or rake leaves. I have a huge lawn I replaced an old pair of steel spiked golf shoes with the track shoes. Lightweight and give me great traction.
customer_reviews.author: ken falls

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great....Needed A Little Help, Though
customer_reviews.text: The Shoe Is Ultra Comphortable. As The Review Notes, Stated....This Is A Track Running Shoe....And I Don't Run Track. The Issue Was Solved With A Special Contact Cement called "Shoe Goo"...And That Gave The Front Of The Shoe's Plastic Grips....Some Traction On A Concrete Surface. It Is A Great Shoe!!!! I Just Had To Re-Work It A bit, For My Needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J. Tauber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at a reasonable price. Came quickly with Prime and were exactly what company said they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 15 year old son who is trying track for the first time. He is very happy with the fit (fit as expected; same size he wears for baseball cleats) and performance, so far. He is using mainly for jumping (long & triple jumps). Package arrived quickly and in good condition. Another great experience with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like that they came with extra cleat attachments and the key to tighten when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyann

customer_reviews.title: Great spike.......Good for wider foot.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Good spike for a wider foot, good to run in 100/200/400/relays. Great grip to the track. A bit more cushion than most sprinter spikes.
customer_reviews.author: 304WVneers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was great - unfortunately I had to send back. These are for sprinting not cross country.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look for the price considering I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid track spikes. They hold up and fit perfectly. After running countless 100s and 200s at 185 lbs they show no signs of where. Great value and look for the price considering I used to use 60$ nikes that had the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Not too tight in the toes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are for my son who is a high school sprinter. Has issues finding sprint shoes that aren't too tight in the toes. He says these fit fairly well but Hope's they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is light as suppose to be and very comfortable with every stride i
customer_reviews.text: I have bought asics before from the store in the same size, and when i looked for these i wasn't completely sure if they would fit the same way but all doubt about the fitting was removed. The shoe is light as suppose to be and very comfortable with every stride i take
customer_reviews.author: Edward Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, perfect fit and arrived very early. The price is outstanding for the quality and performance of the shoe. You will not be able to beat this price. I've looked. :)
customer_reviews.author: Constance M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are fine shoes for entry-level or casual competitor
customer_reviews.text: I buy my sprint shoes a half size smaller than my normal size for a snug fit, so my comments on sizing are to be regarded accordingly. I have purchased ASICS sprint shoes in my normal size in the past, but found them to have too much wiggle room. These fit snugly, as I desired, and I only wear them maybe a half hour at a time, just for races or specialized drills, but would have no trouble going longer if the situation reasonably demands it. These are fine shoes for entry-level or casual competitor!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for smaller size
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to get kids sizes right - especially over the Internet. I bought a smaller size and they took a return and replaced it with these ones. My son loves them. Light, with good grip, good looking, and they protect his feet.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes...short spikes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are designed for sprinting with nubs for spikes. Buy these and replace with your favorite longer spikes from your favorite sporting goods store. Christmas tree 6mm or 7mm seems to work best for my track star.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Can't give five stars as I didn't have them long enough for a good test.
customer_reviews.text: Trained in them for a week, used once in race, then stolen from fieldhouse. Preformed as desired. Can't give five stars as I didn't have them long enough for a good test.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. White

customer_reviews.title: I liked the price
customer_reviews.text: this was my sons first year running track & he was very impressed with the comfort & durability of the shoe. I liked the price. He will be wearing them again this season
customer_reviews.author: Executivemom

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of these shoes. I really enjoy the build and structure too. HOWEVER I was advised to order them a half size larger, I easily could have ordered a full size larger. They are tight in the toebox, and they are tight at the heel.
customer_reviews.author: James Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Track Spikes are great! They are very lightweight and very sturdy. These shoes are the right size and fit, my feet are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Paredes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE FOR THE PRICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes & you really can't beat the price. They are a good shoe that serve their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: LAURIE SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These spikes are awesome! I used these last Cross County (XC) and I plan on using them again this season. They fit well and are durable. I really like how the front of the shoe is made of rubber; this keeps my feet dry when the course gets wet and muddy. I'm definitely buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernLine

customer_reviews.title: Work well for my teenage son
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a teenager who was running track for the first time. It improved his speed right away. He says they are comfortable and fit well. Good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes.. fit as expected. Can't wait to try them out at a meet
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD RUNNING SHOE , MY SON WON THE NATIONAL IN THIS SHOE !
customer_reviews.author: Brian Denman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize these were for sprinting as they came up ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize these were for sprinting as they came up in a search for cross country distance running shoes. Huge mistake! My son got half dollar blisters all over his feet. Not the shoes fault but they shouldn't be coming in a search for long distance running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie M

customer_reviews.title: Track shoes
customer_reviews.text: Son happy with it and I. Looks sharp, feels comfortable, gotten compliments and has aided sufficiently in all races. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son chose these for running track this spring. He says they are comfortable, light weight & look "cool". :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Job Well Done!
customer_reviews.text: Because they fit to my youngest sons expectations. During my sons track meet these shoes feel light and allow him to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: DeLeon C.

customer_reviews.title: track shoes not running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: great fit but these are track shoes, not running shoes. they come with the spikes so you can install it.
customer_reviews.author: cmf

customer_reviews.title: smaller like 9
customer_reviews.text: its smaller than expected but trying to manage with this :( like there is no room for air so perfect fit tight
customer_reviews.author: vasanthakumar

customer_reviews.title: great sprinting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this show for the track. Feels great and is extremely light and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were exactly what my son was looking for. I would recommend them to any runner at any age.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: track shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great and fit perfectly as expected..My son loves running in the shoes and has improved his times during his track meets
customer_reviews.author: Thabang Mokhesi

customer_reviews.title: A little thinner than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good, they just run a little thinner than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Nice unexpensive purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, nice looking, light weight, comfortable and very good for the purpose I bought them for. I'd recommend them to runners.
customer_reviews.author: C E

customer_reviews.title: Missing spikes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit ok. They are a little tight. The only thing that really bothers me is that they are missing the spikes. I would like to think that any item I order would come with all its parts.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how it would fit but I am going on vacation and would give this pair of shoes for my friend's husband. I'm not really sure if he would like it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These track shoes are great and fit just as expected. Comfortable and clean up easily. I will definitely buy them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Farmers Wife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes. They were a great fit, very comfortable, and light for his hurdles. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tnite

customer_reviews.title: What we hoped for
customer_reviews.text: My son finds them to fit perfectly. Reasonable price compared to other running shoes that are available on Amazon. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Need more colors
customer_reviews.text: Wish more colors were available in this size. Black was the only option available in this size and brand at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Herod

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe to start with and my son is already used them in competition and was pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: dinah

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half-size larger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: I wear a standard size 10.5 in all sorts of shoes, but these shoes are at least a half-size too small. Also very narrow at the toe. I'll be returning them. For the price they seem like a good shoe, but I recommend getting a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fit great but the left shoe had a blemish around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but the left shoe had a blemish around the bottom outside. but we had to have the shoes so we use them anyways without sending them back. So I feel that quality control is lacking on final inspection of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit great. Unfortunately the rain canceled the remaining meets for ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great. Unfortunately the rain canceled the remaining meets for the school year so he never wore them. Will order again in the spring but bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: missed spikes of my shoes, please send to me
customer_reviews.text: missed spikes of my shoes. can you please send to me ? Thanks cool cool cool cool cool cool cool
customer_reviews.author: Vessial

customer_reviews.title: don't order unless you need a track shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am in the USAF and part of my requirements is to fitness test twice a year. Fitness testing involves a 1 1/2 mile run. I purchased these shoes because my older shoes were getting worn, and wanted something light and fast for practice runs and the actual timed fitness run. After trying them on, it took all of 3 minutes to decide to return them. They are not running/jogging shoes. They have rigid soles, almost like a hard plate. They are probably great for sprints at the track. On a hard floor and my driveway, they felt slippery and insecure.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: Track shoes, not running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes would probably be fine if I wanted to run track and field or possibly play some cleat requiring sport with them but I was hoping for a running shoe and this does not really fit the bill. Move on if you are wanting something to jog in.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

product_meta.title: Asics - Mens Track And Field Hypersprint 5 Shoes In Black/Silver
product_meta.description: Now in itï¿½s 5th incarnation, the HyperSprintï¿½ 5 features a lightweight combination of mesh and hotmelt TPU overlays in the rearfoot while maintaining itï¿½s supportive synthetic leather forefoot for a sleek and speedy design. The thin rubber outsole is combined with a lightweight nylon spike plate and a five-pin spike design for optimal traction. If it looks like a bullet, it must be fast.
feature_bullets: Increased durability and traction on all surface.
For stability and flexibility. Board lasting in the heel and slip lasting in the forefoot.
Lightweight, comfortable and breathable, enhancing performance and fit.
